name: Going Back To Uni
description:
My first attempt at a game made whilst doing a lovely Bitsy course on zoom with  Claire Morwood of 3 fold games https://www.3foldgames.uk/

This course was organised by the great team at The Edge - The art space of the University of Bath

This simple game explores some of the problems that PhD students will encounter when going back to university and returning to labs following lockdown.
